headline.main: A.M.A. Asks States to Ban 'Smokeless' Cigarette

byline.original: By WILLIAM E. SCHMIDT, Special to the New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The American Medical Association filed petitions with regulatory officials in Arizona and Missouri today seeking to ban the sale and distribution of a new ''smokeless'' cigarette now being test marketed in the two states.
docs.snippet: LEAD: The American Medical Association filed petitions with regulatory officials in Arizona and Missouri today seeking to ban the sale and distribution of a new ''smokeless'' cigarette now being test marketed in the two states.
